edu.cross.ucsc.hse.core.jfchart

Class ChartUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cross.ucsc.hse.core.jfchart.ChartUtils

  • public class ChartUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    ** This set of utilities provides a few services that generate and update chart components. It also generates a XYDataset that can be used to generate many other displays besides the ones provided here
    Author:
    beshort

    • Constructor Summary

      An express method to take care of the main visualization labels in one go.
      static org.jfree.chart.ChartPanel createChartPanel(org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart plot)
      Creates a chart panel to house a JFreeChart, with the important duty of turning off the buffer so the image vectoring comes out correctly
      static org.jfree.chart.plot.CombinedDomainXYPlot createCombinedDomainXYChart(HybridTrajectorySet trajectories, RendererProperties rendering_config, org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart... subplots)
      Creates a combined domain xy plot that will be used to house an arrangement of other chartss

      Creates an XY chart contained in a JFreeChartContainer

      Creates an XYDataset using the data of specified elements of trajectories within the trajectory set that match the selections

    • Method Detail

      • createXYDataset

        public static org.jfree.data.xy.XYDataset createXYDataset(HybridTrajectorySet data_set,
                                                          java.lang.String x_field_selection,
                                                          java.lang.String y_field_selection)
        Creates an XYDataset using the data of specified elements of trajectories within the trajectory set that match the selections
        Parameters:
        data_set - hybrid trajectory set to gather the data from
        x_field_selection - variable name of the x (domain) elements to be selected. It could also be one of the domain handles indicating the domain of the plot is time or jumps
        y_field_selection - variable name of the y (range) elements to be selected. Less likely than with the x selection,It could also be one of the domain handles indicating the rangee of the plot is time or jumps
        Returns:

      • createXYChart

        public static org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart createXYChart(HybridTrajectorySet trajectories,
                                                       org.jfree.data.xy.XYDataset data_set,
                                                       org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart chart_layout,
                                                       RendererProperties rendering_config,
                                                       edu.cross.ucsc.hse.core.jfchart.ChartType type)
        Creates an XY chart contained in a JFreeChartContainer
        Parameters:
        trajectories - hybrid trajectory set to gather the data from
        data_set - data set that will be used to generatre the chart
        chart_layout - a possible preformatted chart to be used, otherwise a null results in a new one being generated
        rendering_config - the properties of the custom hybrid data renderer that allows the colors and strokes to be adjusted and assigned to specific elements
        type - type of plot to be generated
        Returns:

      • createCombinedDomainXYChart

        public static org.jfree.chart.plot.CombinedDomainXYPlot createCombinedDomainXYChart(HybridTrajectorySet trajectories,
                                                                                    RendererProperties rendering_config,
                                                                                    org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart... subplots)
        Creates a combined domain xy plot that will be used to house an arrangement of other chartss
        Parameters:
        trajectories - hybrid trajectory set to gather the data from
        rendering_config - the properties of the custom hybrid data renderer that allows the colors and strokes to be adjusted and assigned to specific elements
        subplots - sub plots to be added into the combined plot;
        Returns:

      • createChartPanel

        public static org.jfree.chart.ChartPanel createChartPanel(org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart plot)
        Creates a chart panel to house a JFreeChart, with the important duty of turning off the buffer so the image vectoring comes out correctly
        Parameters:
        plot - the plot to be loaded into the panel
        Returns:
        chart panel containing specified plot

      • configureChartLabels

        public static void configureChartLabels(org.jfree.chart.ChartPanel panel,
                                        java.lang.String x_axis_label,
                                        java.lang.String y_axis_label,
                                        boolean show_legend,
                                        java.lang.String overall_title)
        An express method to take care of the main visualization labels in one go. Any label set to null will be omitted from the charts
        Parameters:
        panel - chart panel that contains the chart to be edited
        x_axis_label - label to display at the x axis of the chart
        y_axis_label - label to display at the y axis of the chart
        show_legend - flag indicating if legend will be displayed
        overall_title - overall title displayed at top
